text:
Hello developers! 

Who is interested in utilizing build stages in their development workflow? Who is interested in utilizing version control, and wanting GitHub or otherwise to be the source of truth for their code? 

To support these developer workflows, we are introducing new functionality to be able to lock folders within the Design Manager, so the files within those folders can not be edited in the app. 

If you are interested in being part of this beta, simply fill out this form <https://forms.gle/wL5aohw2gqVc5zMr7>! If you have not already done so, make sure to check out the local development tooling at <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/tools/local-development> and join <#CLJJXGTC0|local-development> to provide feedback on this functionality.

See <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1wnZoEqPWJc_aSNyaDacMxyBZozkbl1b2xG8LhfK48zg/edit?usp=sharing> for more details on how to use the feature once you have been notified you account was granted access
(sorry, sounds like there is a permissions issue on this form - working on that!)
Just wanted to say this sounds like a promising direction (though I’m not a good candidate for the beta right this moment) :+1:
